Hello guys! I am selling deep learning machines for only 1$ powered with either TensorFlow or PyTorch - you choose!
​
The machines are funded for 9 hours and are accessed by a terminal with an account created especially for you on the machine website. Specs of the machines:

  • 4 Core CPU
  • 16GB of RAM
  • 1080Ti GPU
  • 120GB of SSD Storage
As you can see our servers are a lot more powerful than the other ones around and are cheaper!

You can buy one here: https://selly.gg/p/572e01be
We have just started working and we hope to be successful!

The machines are 100% guaranteed to be working,and if you have any problems with the service a refund is available.
Our support team works 24/7 and if you have problems contact us at:
horizoncloud@tech-center.com
